ing: 1 pound large cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined, tails removed
des: "This quick and easy to make appetizer is sure to please your guests. Made this for a summer BBQ. It was gone in minutes."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado and cilantro. Stir in the cocktail sauce and hot pepper sauce until evenly coated. Divide into 8 small portions and serve with lime wedges and tortilla chips.
